hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source ~/.env/OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR
source /usr/libexec/openshift/cartridges/abstract/info/lib/jenkins_util
jenkins_rsync UPSTREAM_SSH:~/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/ ~/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/
# Build setup and run user pre_build and build . ci_build.sh
JAVA_OPTS="-Dceylon.cache.repo=~/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/cache" JAVA_OPTS="$JAVA_OPTS -Dcom.redhat.ceylon.common.tool.terminal.width=9999" #do not wrap output
export JAVA_OPTS export PRESERVE_JAVA_OPTS="true"
ceylon_repos="--rep http://modules.ceylon-lang.org/test/" ceylon_repos="${ceylon_repos} --rep $OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/" ceylon_repos="${ceylon_repos} --rep $OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR/$WORKSPACE/.openshift/config/modules"
compile_files=`find $OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR/app-root/repo/source/ -name *\.ceylon -o -name *\.java` printf "Compiling files:\n$compile_files\n" ${CEYLON_HOME}/bin/ceylon compile --src $OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR/app-root/repo/source --out $OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR/app-root/data/ceylon/repo ${ceylon_repos} ${compile_files}
# Stop app jenkins_stop_app UPSTREAM_SSH
# Push content back to application jenkins_rsync ~/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/ UPSTREAM_SSH:~/app-root/data/ceylon/repo/
# Configure / start app jenkins_start_app UPSTREAM_SSH
